name: Orihime Inoue | character and outfits
description:
From the Anime Bleach esp The Thousand-Year Blood War arc

Made this for myself since i find it difficult to get her Blood war outfit right with some loras, might as well share it here for archiving purposes.

Rec Weight : 0.6-0.8

For realistic and semi realistic i suggest 0.8

Images were generated at 512x768

I also use Hires.fix for all the generated image

for optimal result uses these trigger prompt

Trigger prompt for Blood war arc outfit: Orihimesomakj, orange hair, navel, cleavage, midriff, crop top, clothing cutout, cleavage cutout,white long skirt,puffy sleeves

Trigger prompt for Hueco Mundo arc outfit: Orihimesomakj, orange hair, long sleeves, dress, white dress,puffy sleeves

Trigger prompt for her school uniform outfit: Orihimesomakj,skirt, orange hair, shirt, long sleeves, school uniform, jacket, white shirt,collared shirt, bowtie, red bow,blazer, red bowtie, grey jacket

Might add other outfits later, you're welcome to give me more datasets

For non-commercial use

Image trained using mainly anime snapshot, manga cover, some booru stuff, and manga colored pages. All credit goes to char creator Tite Kubo.

Can't guarantee you got the same result from my prompt, could be a different upscaler/vae or clip skip.
